#labels build
How to build the fvp?


download
  *svn checkout https://fvp.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ fvp

configure:
  *./configure --host=arm-hismall-linux
  
build:
  *make clean;make

run:
  * mount the fvp dir 
    mount -t nfs -o nolock hostipaddr:/home/code/fvp /mnt
    hostipaddr : the linux host ip address such as 192.168.0.111

  * cd /mnt/src/test;./meida_play_test
